name: Indian Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1.5 lbs chicken thighs, cut into pieces
steps:
Heat vegetable oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Add chopped onion and cook for 5-6 minutes until golden brown.
Add minced garlic and grated ginger, cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add all spices (curry powder, cumin, coriander, turmeric, cayenne) and stir for 30 seconds.
Add chicken pieces and cook for 5-6 minutes until browned on all sides.
Pour in diced tomatoes with their juice and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Stir in coconut milk and yogurt. Simmer for another 5 minutes.
Add lemon juice and fresh cilantro.
Season with salt to taste. Serve hot over basmati rice or with naan bread.
